18.04.2002 JJ request AS/SH major revision
UFB allows getting GNRD paths in either Win and/or AS400 format or
converts the provided path to it's corresponding Win/AS400 format
0: convert pio.PathWinFormat
<>0: Get from GNRD
0: OK
1: Path not found in GNRD (only relevant if type <>0)
2: Empty path
po.PathOSFormat/return value:
po.ErrorCode <> 0: blank
ENV_PROCESOR_ARCHITECTURE = x86: pio.PathWinFormat
else: po.PathAS400Format
If requested fetch from GNRD
13-NOV-ASe, if [GNRD] entry for given directory exists, this will overwrite
the GNRD setting from database
Extract logical names if % in path (UFB522)
Extract logical hosts if path after extracting logical names starts with '('
trim and Set all / to \ in winpath
AS400 path strip host if present and set \ to /
In case of any error return blank paths
OS: x86 processor architecture then Win else AS400
20.12.2010 In Poland we do constantly loos network connectivity, for this reason
we do always (if not AS400) check if there's access and connect network drive
if there's not. All programs which use UFB533 then won't fail due to this proble
Note: We should do this for IFS directories only (TODO)
add trailing backslash if not there and not a file name (. in path)
